item.title: Staying Ahead of Amazon, in Amazon Treasure Hunt Contest
item.description: Last week Amazon India had a Treasure Hunt contest which ran for a whole week. The contest was simple, from 10am to 6pm, every hour Amazon would display a clue (image) and you had to guess the product. That particular product would be on sale for â‚¹1, which also included shipping cost anywhere in India. The contest was app only i.e. image also would be displayed in the app and you had to buy using the app.

item.title: I discovered a vulnerability on Gaana.com before the main POC hack
item.description: Update: I have removed the blog post. TLDR; On 12th of May I had discovered a vulnerability on Gaana.com. I contacted their team and it was fixed recently. I had written blog post in detail about it, now I think it’s best I remove everything. Thanks for reading!
